entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
